articles.title: India vs Pakistan Live Score, Asia Cup 2023: Looks very grim in Colombo, rain set play spoilsport on reserve day as well - The Indian Express
articles.description: Asia Cup 2023 Live Score, IND vs PAK Match Today: There is a 80% chance of rain from 4 pm on reserve day, which is only an hour into play, provided India resume their innings at 3 pm.
articles.content:
